All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Authority
 
AuthorityConstants
 
AuthorityController
Handles operations related to student authority management. APIs available: Retrieve a list of students for a specified class (getStudentList) Grant permissions to students based on provided authority list (setAuthorities) All endpoint require token obtained from logging in Teacher specific: getStudentList setAuthorities
AuthorityMapper
 
AuthorityService
 
AuthorityServiceImpl
 
ComparingFaces
Handle the calling of aws rekognition to compare input image and stored image
DdosFilter
A filter that implements DDoS protection by limiting the number of requests from a single IP address within a specified time frame.
Exam
 
ExamAppApplication
 
ExamController
Handles information about exam lists and exam content. APIs available: create or update exam info (update) get the list of exams (getExamList) retrieve exam content (getExamContent) All endpoint require token obtained from logging in Teacher specific: update getExamList: shows all exams to teachers while only permitted exams are shown to students. getExamContent: shows content to teachers at all times while masking content for students outside of allowed timing.
ExamMapper
 
ExamService
 
ExamServiceImpl
 
ExamStatusService
 
ExamStatusServiceImpl
 
JwtUtil
Handle token definition, validation and username extraction
MyBatisPlusConfig
 
packageInfo
This package stores APIs that the frontend interacts with.
RedisConstant
 
S3Util
Handle store and retrieve of image to s3
SecurityAuthority
 
SecurityConfig
Here configure DdosFilter and TokenFilter for spring security.
SecurityContextHolderUtil
Handle the retrieval of permission and username stored in SecurityContextHolder TokenFilter store permission and username in SecurityContextHolder corresponding to token for caching This prevents repeated retrieval from sql
SecurityUser
 
StatusController
Handles operations related to student verification and suspicious image management. APIs available: check if the input image matches the stored user image (checkFaces) retrieve a list of suspicious images for a specific user and class (getSuspiciousImageList) retrieve a list of students along with their suspicious status (getSuspiciousList) All endpoint require token obtained from logging in Teacher specific: getSuspiciousImageList: getSuspiciousList
TokenFilter
A filter that validates JSON Web Tokens (JWT) JwtUtil for user authentication and sets the security context for authenticated users.
User
Represents a user in the system.
UserController
Handles operations related to user authentication and registration. APIs available: User login requests with image verification (login) Registers a new user with an uploaded image (register) Retrieve a paginated list of students along with their associated classes (getStudentWithClasses) login and register are the only endpoint that does not require logging in.
UserMapper
 
UserService
 
UserServiceImpl
